entry.title: Combined summary - Timechain - Time-Lock Encryption
entry.summary: In an email exchange between Mashuri Clark and Rusty Russell, Mashuri shared a link to Timechain - a unique way to implement a time lock. Russell responded by saying that while interesting, it is not obviously relevant to the development of the lightning network. Russell added that he tries to keep the mailing list free from spam, which can become a problem with people promoting their latest altcoin pump. Mashuri acknowledged Russell's efforts in running a tight ship and promised to stay within his parameters.
